desc: BrightFox is the best drink to stay hydrated; packed with electrolytes, vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants that optimize your night and brighten your morning. Zero Calories | Zero Sugar | Zero Sweeteners | Zero Color | Zero Stimulants.

layout.text:
THE HIGHEST
ELECTROLYTE BEVERAGE
WITH ZERO COMPROMISE

BrightFox is the optimal healthy hydration solution. It contains the highest amount of electrolytes with no compromise, using a scientifically formulated mix of vitamins, minerals and antioxidants. With zero calories, zero sugars, zero sweeteners, zero stimulants and zero coloring, BrightFox optimizes your hydration cycle both day and night for a Brighter Tomorrow.
